title: Sri Lanka-Japan business environment panel meet; discuss issues faced by investors
byline: Committee was launched to address challenges faced by Japanese companies operating in Sri Lanka

title: Risk of political flare-ups to linger in 2026 for some Asia-Pacific sovereigns: Fitch
byline: "The resilience of a sovereign’s ratings to major bouts of unrest will depend on its credit buffers."

title: Sri Lanka apparel exports decline 0.05-pct in October 2025: JAAF
byline: Shipments to the USA, UK and other markets fell but exports to the EU grew

title: Sri Lanka pineapple harvests raised 300-pct, mangoes 90-pct with China advice
byline: Two-year project supported by the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs (MARA) of China

byline: President to attend Ceylon Chamber’s Sri Lanka Economic and Investment Summit 2025 opening

title: Sri Lanka rupee weaker, bonds yields steady
byline: An auction of 42,000 million rupees Treasury bonds was going on.

title: Sri Lanka to call investors to develop Galle Port as tourist hub
byline: We are focusing on developing Galle Port as a hub for tourism

byline: The move aimed at ensuring such expenditures align strictly with national development objectives.

title: Sri Lanka rupee weaker, bond yields edge up on short end of curve

title: Sri Lanka daily tourist spend falls, independent travellers stay longer, women 58-pct
byline: 46-pct booked through online portals, 18 percent were repeat visitors, 70-pct university graduates
